generation_failed.title: Generering mislyktes
generation_failed.message: Du må ha åpnet et dokument for å kunne generere utskrift.

export_document_failed.title: Exporting document(s) failed
export_document_failed.message: You must open a document before exporting it.

export_template_failed.title: Exporting template(s) failed
export_template_failed.message: You must open a template before exporting it.

context_menu_root.title: Error while removing
context_menu_root.message: You cannot delete the root node. To remove a document, do this in "My documents".

soft_remove_document_failed.title: Error while removing
soft_remove_document_failed.message: Could not move the document to the trash.

soft_remove_document_success.title: Removal successful
soft_remove_document_success.message: The document is now in the trash.

soft_remove_template_failed.title: Error while removing
soft_remove_template_failed.message: Could not move the template to the trash.

soft_remove_template_success.title: Removal successful
soft_remove_template_success.message: The template is now in the trash.

create_document_failed.title: Failed creating new document
create_document_failed.message: Could not create the new document. Please try again.

create_document_success.title: Document created
create_document_success.message: The document is ready to be used.

create_template_failed.title: Failed creating new template
create_template_failed.message: Could not create the new template. Please try again.

create_template_success.title: Template created
create_template_success.message: The template is ready to be used.
